spirit:component.spirit:name: ten_gig_eth_pcs_pma_ip
spirit:component.spirit:description: The Xilinx Ten Gigabit Ethernet PCS/PMA (10GBASE-R) core is designed to the IEEE specification 802.3 2008. An example design and development scripts are provided to accelerate your design cycle. For 10GBASE-KR interest, please contact your local Xilinx sales representative.
